title: Hackers steal passwords, emails from hookup websites
description: Databases are being sold on the dark web, potentially affecting tens of thousands of victims.

title: iOS 17 leak shows how Apple's updated apps might look
description: The Wallet app, Health app and wallpaper picker are in line to get a refresh when iOS 17 arrives.

title: The Google Pixel Fold design gets revealed in full in leaked images
description: We've got leaked renders of the Pixel Fold from a reliable source, with a potential launch only days away.

title: Asus ROG Ally price leak suggests entry-level model may not be as cheap as we hoped
description: The lower-tier ROG Ally gaming handheld might not be all that much cheaper than the top-end model, it seems.

title: Sorry, your Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse fan theories are 'way off base'
description: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse's directors explain why all of your fan theories about the movie are wrong.

title: This fake Android Minecraft app is just chock-full of adware

title: Controversial hard drive vendor breaks new record with cheapest HDD yet

title: Smartphones of the future may have inflatable keyboards on OLED displays

title: Samsung's art-inspired Frame TV opts for aesthetic upgrade over hardware boost
